title: H3mMap
description: A map for Heroes of Might and Magic III

format.description: Format of the map. Only Shadow of Death is supported, so this must always be equal to 28.

basic_info.description: Basic information about the map. Only Shadow of Death is supported, so this must always be equal to 28.

is_playable.description: Indicates whether the map is playable. This should be either 0 or 1, but .h3m stores it as 1 byte.

map_size.description: Width and height of the map (in tiles).

has_two_levels.description: Indicates whether the map has the underground level. This should be either 0 or 1, but .h3m stores it as 1 byte.

difficulty.description: Difficulty of the map. The known values are [0; 4], but .h3m stores in as 1 byte.

max_hero_level.description: Maximum allowed level for all heroes. 0 means to limit.
